name: @DynamicEndpoints/m365-core-mcp
description:
*Updated December 9th 2025**
Manage your Microsoft 365 services effortlessly. Create and manage distribution lists, security groups, and user settings with ease, ensuring streamlined operations and enhanced collaboration. Automate offboarding processes to maintain security and compliance effortlessly.

tools.name: manage_distribution_lists
tools.description: Manage Exchange distribution lists including creation, updates, member management, and settings configuration.

action.description: Action to perform on distribution list

listId.description: Distribution list ID for existing list operations

displayName.description: Display name for the distribution list

emailAddress.description: Email address for the distribution list

tools.name: manage_security_groups
tools.description: Manage Azure AD security groups for access control, including group creation, membership, and security settings.

action.description: Action to perform on security group

groupId.description: Security group ID for existing group operations

displayName.description: Display name for the security group

tools.name: manage_m365_groups
tools.description: Manage Microsoft 365 groups for team collaboration with shared resources like mailbox, calendar, and files.

action.description: Action to perform on M365 group

groupId.description: M365 group ID for existing group operations

displayName.description: Display name for the M365 group

tools.name: manage_exchange_settings
tools.description: Manage Exchange Online settings including mailbox configuration, transport rules, and organization policies.

action.description: Action to perform on Exchange settings

settingType.description: Type of Exchange settings to manage

tools.name: manage_user_settings
tools.description: Manage user account settings including profile information, mailbox settings, licenses, and authentication methods.

action.description: Action to perform on user settings

tools.name: manage_offboarding
tools.description: Automate user offboarding processes including account disablement, license removal, data backup, and access revocation.

userId.description: User ID or UPN to offboard

tools.name: manage_sharepoint_sites
tools.description: Manage SharePoint sites including creation, configuration, permissions, and site collection administration.

action.description: Action to perform on SharePoint site

siteId.description: SharePoint site ID for existing site operations

template.description: Web template ID for site creation (e.g., STS#3 for Modern Team Site)

tools.name: manage_sharepoint_lists
tools.description: Manage SharePoint lists and libraries including schema definition, items, views, and permissions.

items.description: Items to add to the list

action.description: Action to perform on SharePoint list

listId.description: SharePoint list ID for existing list operations

siteId.description: SharePoint site ID containing the list

template.description: Template to use for list creation

tools.name: manage_azure_ad_roles
tools.description: Manage Azure AD administrative roles including role assignments, custom roles, and privilege escalation controls.

principalId.description: ID of the principal (user, group, SP)

assignmentId.description: ID of the role assignment to remove

tools.name: manage_azure_ad_apps
tools.description: Manage Azure AD application registrations including app permissions, credentials, and OAuth configurations.

ownerId.description: Object ID of the user to add/remove as owner

tools.name: manage_azure_ad_devices
tools.description: Manage devices registered in Azure AD including device compliance, BitLocker keys, and device actions.

tools.name: manage_service_principals
tools.description: Manage service principals for application access including permissions, credentials, and enterprise applications.

spId.description: Object ID of the Service Principal

ownerId.description: Object ID of the user to add/remove as owner

tools.name: call_microsoft_api
tools.description: Make direct calls to any Microsoft Graph or Azure Resource Management API endpoint with full control over HTTP methods and parameters.

apiType.description: API type: Microsoft Graph or Azure Resource Management

fetchAll.description: Set to true to automatically fetch all pages for list results (e.g., users, groups). Default is false.

batchSize.description: Batch size for pagination when fetchAll is true (1-1000, default: 100)

apiVersion.description: Azure API version (required for Azure APIs)

maxRetries.description: Maximum number of retries for failed requests (0-5, default: 3)

retryDelay.description: Base delay between retries in milliseconds (100-10000, default: 1000)

expandFields.description: Array of fields to expand (applies $expand automatically for Graph API)

selectFields.description: Array of specific fields to select (applies $select automatically for Graph API)

customHeaders.description: Additional custom headers to include in the request

graphApiVersion.description: Microsoft Graph API version to use (default: v1.0)

consistencyLevel.description: Graph API ConsistencyLevel header. ADVISED to be set to 'eventual' for Graph GET requests using advanced query parameters ($filter, $count, $search, $orderby).

tools.name: search_audit_log
tools.description: Search and analyze Azure AD unified audit logs for security events, user activities, and compliance monitoring.

top.description: Maximum number of records to return

tools.name: manage_alerts
tools.description: Manage security alerts from Microsoft Defender and other security products including investigation and remediation.

top.description: Maximum number of alerts to return

alertId.description: ID of the alert (required for get_alert)

tools.name: manage_dlp_policies
tools.description: Manage Data Loss Prevention policies to protect sensitive data across Exchange, SharePoint, OneDrive, and Teams.

tools.name: manage_dlp_incidents
tools.description: Investigate and manage DLP policy violations and incidents including user notifications and remediation actions.

tools.name: manage_intune_macos_devices
tools.description: Manage macOS devices in Intune including enrollment, compliance policies, device actions, and inventory management.

tools.name: manage_intune_macos_policies
tools.description: Manage macOS configuration profiles and compliance policies for device security and management settings.

tools.name: manage_intune_macos_apps
tools.description: Manage macOS application deployment including app assignments, updates, and installation requirements.

tools.name: manage_intune_macos_compliance
tools.description: Assess macOS device compliance status and generate reports on policy adherence and security posture.

tools.name: manage_intune_windows_devices
tools.description: Manage Windows devices in Intune including enrollment, autopilot deployment, device actions, and health monitoring.

tools.name: manage_intune_windows_policies
tools.description: Manage Windows configuration profiles and compliance policies including security baselines and update rings.

tools.name: manage_intune_windows_apps
tools.description: Manage Windows application deployment including Win32 apps, Microsoft Store apps, and Office 365 assignments.

tools.name: manage_intune_windows_compliance
tools.description: Assess Windows device compliance status including BitLocker encryption, antivirus status, and security configurations.

tools.name: manage_compliance_frameworks
tools.description: Manage compliance frameworks and standards including HIPAA, GDPR, SOX, PCI-DSS, ISO 27001, and NIST configurations.

tools.name: manage_compliance_assessments
tools.description: Conduct compliance assessments and generate detailed reports on regulatory adherence and security controls.

tools.name: manage_compliance_monitoring
tools.description: Monitor ongoing compliance status with real-time alerts for policy violations and regulatory changes.

tools.name: manage_evidence_collection
tools.description: Collect and preserve compliance evidence including audit logs, configuration snapshots, and attestation records.

systems.description: Specific systems to collect evidence from

tools.name: manage_gap_analysis
tools.description: Perform gap analysis to identify compliance deficiencies and generate remediation recommendations.

tools.name: generate_audit_reports
tools.description: Generate comprehensive audit reports for compliance frameworks with evidence documentation and findings.

tools.name: manage_cis_compliance
tools.description: Manage CIS (Center for Internet Security) benchmark compliance including assessment and remediation tracking.

tools.name: manage_retention_policies
tools.description: Manage retention policies for content across Exchange, SharePoint, OneDrive, and Teams with lifecycle rules.

action.description: Action to perform on retention policy

policyId.description: Retention policy ID for specific operations

displayName.description: Display name for the retention policy

retentionAction.description: Action to take after retention period

tools.name: manage_sensitivity_labels
tools.description: Manage sensitivity labels for information protection including encryption, content marking, and classification policies.

action.description: Action to perform on sensitivity label

labelId.description: Sensitivity label ID for specific operations

displayName.description: Display name for the sensitivity label

tools.name: manage_information_protection_policies
tools.description: Manage Azure Information Protection policies for data classification, encryption, and rights management.

action.description: Action to perform on information protection policy

policyId.description: Information protection policy ID for specific operations

tools.name: manage_conditional_access_policies
tools.description: Manage Azure AD conditional access policies for zero-trust security including MFA, device compliance, and location-based controls.

action.description: Action to perform on Conditional Access policy

policyId.description: Conditional Access policy ID for specific operations

tools.name: manage_defender_policies
tools.description: Manage Microsoft Defender for Office 365 policies including Safe Attachments, Safe Links, anti-phishing, and anti-malware.

action.description: Action to perform on Defender policy

policyId.description: Defender policy ID for specific operations

actionOnError.description: Action on error for Safe Attachments

allowClickThrough.description: Allow click through for Safe Links

enableForInternalSenders.description: Enable Safe Links for internal senders

tools.name: manage_teams_policies
tools.description: Manage Microsoft Teams policies for messaging, meetings, calling, apps, and live events across the organization.

action.description: Action to perform on Teams policy

policyId.description: Teams policy ID for specific operations

allowAnonymousUsersToDialOut.description: Allow anonymous users to dial out

allowAnonymousUsersToStartMeeting.description: Allow anonymous users to start meetings

tools.name: manage_exchange_policies
tools.description: Manage Exchange Online policies including mail flow rules, mobile device access, and organization-wide settings.

action.description: Action to perform on Exchange policy

policyId.description: Exchange policy ID for specific operations

maxInactivityTimeDeviceLock.description: Max inactivity time before device lock in minutes

isDefault.description: Whether this is the default policy

tools.name: manage_sharepoint_governance_policies
tools.description: Manage SharePoint governance policies including sharing controls, access restrictions, and site lifecycle management.

siteCollections.description: Site collections the policy applies to

webApplications.description: Web applications the policy applies to

action.description: Action to perform on SharePoint governance policy

policyId.description: SharePoint governance policy ID for specific operations

tools.name: manage_security_alert_policies
tools.description: Manage security alert policies for monitoring threats, suspicious activities, and compliance violations across Microsoft 365.

action.description: Action to perform on security alert policy

policyId.description: Security alert policy ID for specific operations

tools.name: generate_powerpoint_presentation
tools.description: Create professional PowerPoint presentations with custom slides, charts, tables, and themes from Microsoft 365 data.

top.description: Number of results to return (for list action)

action.description: Action to perform: create new presentation, get existing, list all, or export to format

slides.description: Array of slide definitions to create

driveId.description: OneDrive/SharePoint drive ID where file should be created (default: user's OneDrive)

fileName.description: Name for the new presentation file (for create action)

folderId.description: Folder ID within the drive (default: root)

tools.name: generate_word_document
tools.description: Create professional Word documents with formatted sections, tables, charts, and table of contents from analysis data.

top.description: Number of results to return (for list action)

action.description: Action: create new document, get existing, list all, export to format, or append content

fileName.description: Name for the new document file (for create action)

folderId.description: Folder ID within the drive (default: root)

sections.description: Array of content sections to create

companyLogo.description: URL to company logo for header

tools.name: generate_html_report
tools.description: Create interactive HTML reports and dashboards with responsive design, charts, and filtering capabilities.

top.description: Number of results to return (for list action)

action.description: Action: create new HTML report, get existing, or list all

fileName.description: Name for the HTML file (for create action)

folderId.description: Folder ID within the drive (default: root)

sections.description: Array of HTML sections to create

template.description: Template configuration for HTML report styling

tools.name: generate_professional_report
tools.description: Generate comprehensive professional reports in multiple formats (PowerPoint, Word, HTML, PDF) from Microsoft 365 data.

driveId.description: OneDrive/SharePoint drive ID for saving reports

reportType.description: Type of professional report to generate

label.description: Label for this data in the report

endpoint.description: Microsoft Graph API endpoint to call

dataQueries.description: Data queries to execute and include in report

includeCharts.description: Include visual charts in the report

includeTables.description: Include data tables in the report

outputFormats.description: Output formats to generate (can select multiple)

tools.name: oauth_authorize
tools.description: Manage OAuth 2.0 authorization for user-delegated access to OneDrive and SharePoint files with secure token handling.

code.description: Authorization code to exchange for access token

action.description: OAuth action: get authorization URL, exchange code for token, refresh token, or revoke access

scopes.description: OAuth scopes to request (e.g., Files.ReadWrite, Sites.ReadWrite.All)

refreshToken.description: Refresh token to exchange for new access token

tools.name: execute_graph_batch
tools.description: Execute multiple Microsoft Graph API requests in a single batch operation for improved performance and efficiency.

tools.name: execute_delta_query
tools.description: Track incremental changes to Microsoft Graph resources using delta queries for efficient synchronization.

tools.name: manage_graph_subscriptions
tools.description: Manage webhook subscriptions for real-time change notifications from Microsoft Graph resources.

tools.name: execute_graph_search
tools.description: Execute advanced search queries across Microsoft 365 content including emails, files, messages, and calendar events.
